global.title: Minimal whiteboard for sketching and prototyping
global.description: Folio is a minimalistic digital whiteboard for sketching and prototyping. It is designed to be simple and easy to use, with a focus on speed and efficiency.

meta.name: og:description
meta.value: Folio is a digital whiteboard for sketching and prototyping

highlights.title: Design with total Privacy.
highlights.description: We are committed to keeping your work private and secure. For that reason, folio uses the local storage of your browser to ensure that your drawings are accessible only to you.

highlights.title: Boundless Canvas.
highlights.description: Unleash your imagination on an infinite canvas. Whether you are sketching, prototyping, or creating, folio provides limitless space for your creativity to flourish.

highlights.title: Organize your ideas.
highlights.description: The new Pages feature allows you to organize your drawings into distinct pages, making it effortless to manage and present your ideas.

highlights.title: Save, Organize, and Reuse Elements
highlights.description: Use the Library to create a personal repository of reusable components. Import and export your collections to collaborate or organize projects, and sync across all boards for consistent access.
